workspace.name: mlw-sw-explore-docs
workspace.query:
(: # show all documents in the players directory # could also be a collection # How would you do this in JavaScript? :)
for $doc in xdmp:directory( "/players/" ) return fn:document-uri( $doc )

(: # show the body of 1 document in the players directory :)
for $doc in xdmp:directory( "/players/" )[1] return $doc

(: # show the body of 1 document in the teams directory :)
for $doc in xdmp:directory( "/teams/" )[1] return $doc

(: # show the body of 1 document in the match collection :)
for $doc in xdmp:directory( "/matches/" ) return $doc
